Key Match Events: Fakhar Zaman scored an unbeaten 126* off 81 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Fakhar Zaman said that this Pakistani team is very talented and just needed to hit their stride
Fakhar Zaman noted that the team had always remained upbeat during their campaign
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain fell to earn Pakistan a win by DLS Method against New Zealand
Pakistan reached 200/1 in 25.3 overs of their attempted chase of 402 to win
Others: Four consecutive losses left Pakistan facing the prospect of an early exit from the World Cup
Should Australia beat Afghanistan on Tuesday and Sri Lanka beat the Kiwis on Thursday then it would leave Pakistan firmly in control of the race for qualification
